name: FullCall VideoChat
author: FullCall

sections.description:
This is a one-click installation plugin for FullCall. It is audio and video chat for your website. Easy to use compatible with all modern browsers. This plugin integrates your website with external services. To run it on your website, you must create an account on FullCall system. More about features and account you read on FullCall.com.

Manual installation

  1. Upload “FullCall.zip” to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory and install.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Enjoy!
sections.faq:
What is it?

The main feature of this plugin is user-friendly to integrate with external api and communication systems for a website. This plugin was created for FullCall clients who use WordPress. It is a dedicated plugin for the WordPress framework, which is user-friendly and easy to use.

Who should be install this?

In our opinion, these features are perfect for online shops and all other types of websites for an industry like automotive, diet, health, real estate, doctors, lawyers, finance, administration, and services. FullCall is a universal toolbox with communication tools. Generally, it is easy to integrate and use by all site owners and site visitors. It is a perfect way to add to your site communication canal with you by audio/video conversations, chat, and email. This tool is developing for small websites and great web services. You can use FullCall for free – the free plan is dedicated to small websites, shops, etc. We have also pay plans with more features – read more in our site.

How work this plugin?

This plugin integrates your website with FullCall system. It checks your FullCall account and adds a plugin to your website footer. After activating your FullCall’s account in register’s email, you get the possibility to communicate with your website visitors.

Tell me more about private policy?

Everyone who uses FullCall is safe because we use SSL encryption. FullCall widget after loading site generates a random string of chars and stores that in visitor browser. This information is useful for site owners in revisits by visitors. For FullCall every visitor is only a random string of chars. You can read more about policy on our website FullCall.com

Can I use FullCall without this plugin?

Yes, you can integrate with FullCall system manually. More about integration steps you will receive in email after register on FullCall.com.

Feature list:

  1. Video call / Video chat
  2. Audio call / Audio chat
  3. Chat
  4. Features for shop ex. special discounts
  5. Independent schedule for chat and videocall
  6. Many options of notifications
  7. Personalized widget
  8. Many many more …

Advantages:

  • powerful communication with clients
  • one-click video calls
  • easy to use by clients and site owners

More about in link FullCall.com
